subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets dealt away Casey Meisner, their 2013 third-round draft pick, for cash considerations and Clippard, who has been one of baseball’s best relievers in recent years.
snippet: The Mets dealt away Casey Meisner, their 2013 third-round draft pick, for cash considerations and Clippard, who has been one of baseball’s best relievers in recent years.
